WRITING.TITLE: Overgrown, Oil on Canvas Board, 14" x 11"

WRITING.TEXT: I was going to sort of ask this question. More specifically I'm wondering, if you target 3 of your opponents Clues, he sacs 2 of them in response, do you only make 1 Gremlin or 3 Gremlins?
Just be happy it's instant.
Michael Biehn

I do like it, I've watched it several times. I can't say it's the best of 2016 because I don't remember all the trailers from this year. This might be sacrilege for some, but, I kind of don't want/need Harrison Ford in this movie. He wont ruin it for me but I just fear that he is being shoe-horned in for nostalgia sake.
Trinisphere looks sick. Also, love the flavor text on Grindstone.

Yeah, at the base level it's meant to evoke nostalgia for the purposes of this episode, and it does. Beyond that, the specific song choices are well picked for certain parts. I was actually amazed they paid for the rights to use ALL of those songs.

WRITING.TITLE: Point Lobos 2, Oil on canvas, 14" x 11"

WRITING.TEXT: I bet the island one is the best coaster.
Falling Star: Playas gonna play
While I too didn't want Black Lotus as #1, I don't feel like he is being disingenuous. I loved the Blinking Spirit story. Stories like that are what made the whole list fun.
Maybe I'm really late to the party, but I had no idea that the drawing of Karn was in the background of Stroke of Genius.
It's the worst thing ever, but I would be SO proud if I invented it.
I didn't really read your post, but I did click on the craigslist ad. I just can't get over 90 degree rotated pictures. It's the most soul-irking thing in the world.
Arabian Nights
Maybe I'm stupid, but the oracle text is beyond confusing to me. But I understand the card as it is printed.
Yeah, I thought the same. Whether intentional or not it's a misleading/click-bait title.
Collector's Edition [[Personal Incarnation]]
Triskelion is definitely one I thought would be perfect for Kaladesh.
I used 4 out of these 10, and they did do work.
I tried designing a dumb Modern deck built around this idea - http://tappedout.net/mtg-decks/lost-legacy-in-modern/
2 Revised Tundras
Page 22, that game "Lunch Money" was pretty fun.
Yes

I don't know if it's a bad thing per se. It makes the format more aggressive, as opposed to 2/3's bouncing off each other. Not only that, but they've designed most of the new aggro creatures to benefit from attacking.

Yeah, for sure this little guy did work for me too. The only sad part was when he was all I had left and [[Hunt the Weak]] only gets me a trade vs. a 3/2 - and there are a lot of 3/2's. Still, he was definitely an awesome 2-drop. It's a great feeling when you use energy to do something and realize you don't have to pay any mana.
Especially [[Panharmonicon]]
Doesn't make you wrong or right, but the art was made extremely last minute, so that's why it's so simple/crude.

I would have posted this but I didn't bother because I figured it would just get downvoted to oblivion. There are groups of people that are just obsessed with hating certain Youtube channels for who knows what reason. I upvoted anyways.
Kind of reminds of [[Sinbad]]
[[Haunted Cloak]] - makes him 3 mana cheaper to cast - or 2 if you want to equip him that turn, and then he can attack too.
Wow, that one person at Pax got real close to the name when they said "Clockwork Colossus" during the Pax Invents the Card thing - https://youtu.be/o6y3dypBGPg?t=1440
This set is too much, I can't take it.
The fact that they've been printing cards like Sanctum Prelate and Dack Fayden means there is, at the very least, an acknowledgement of Vintage on WotC's part.
But are there "Stranger Things" to come?
It is kind of weirdly between uncommon and rare. But, I think it's fair to say already that this set is at a pretty high power level in general.
So far, this is the only vehicle that can do something each turn without being Crewed. Really dig this card.
Maybe I'm too hyped and it's not as good as I think, but I'm surprised it's uncommon.
You are right, I guess I just got excited to see what the card is actually going to be, because the art is dope.
Based on the name, I thought the art was gonna be this: https://i.redd.it/pn1uje32wejx.png
